TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingContext extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type BindingContext = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 管理任何继承自 类的对象的 对象集合。

span.span: Manages the collection of objects for any object that inherits from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 Windows 窗体具有至少一个对象，用于管理窗体的对象。Each Windows Form has at least one object that manages the objects for the form. 因为类是抽象的的返回类型属性是或。Because the class is abstract, the return type of the property is either a or a . 如果数据源是可返回单个属性 （而不是对象的列表） 的对象是。If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the is a . 例如，如果您指定作为数据源，返回。For example, if you specify a as the data source, a is returned. 另一方面，如果数据源是一个对象，实现或、返回。On the other hand, if the data source is an object that implements or , a is returned. 对于 Windows 窗体上每个数据源，存在是单个或。For each data source on a Windows Form, there is a single or . 因为可能存在多个 Windows 窗体中，与关联的数据源使你能够检索任何特定与数据源相关联。Because there may be multiple data sources associated with a Windows Form, the enables you to retrieve any particular associated with a data source. > [!NOTE] > 使用时属性，创建一个新如果尚不存在。When using the property, the creates a new if one does not already exist. 这可能会导致一些混淆，因为返回的对象不能管理列表 （或任何列表） 想。This can lead to some confusion, as the returned object may not manage the list (or any list) that you intend. 若要防止返回无效，使用方法以确定预期已存在。To prevent returning an invalid , use the method to determine if the intended already exists. 如果使用的容器控件，如， ，或，用于包含数据绑定控件，可以创建为只是该容器控件及其控件。If you use a container control, such as a , , or , to contain data-bound controls, you can create a for just that container control and its controls. 然后，可以由自己管理你的窗体的每个部分。Then, each part of your form can be managed by its own . 请参阅详细了解创建多个构造函数相同的数据源的对象。See the constructor for more information about creating multiple objects for the same data source. 如果您将添加控件与窗体和它的列的数据集，该控件中的表与之通信的绑定的该窗体。If you add a control to a form and bind it to a column of a table in a dataset, the control communicates with the of that form. ，反过来，与特定于为该数据关联。The , in turn, talks to the specific for that data association. 如果您已查询`Position`的属性，它将报告该绑定的当前记录控件。If you queried the `Position` property of the , it would report the current record for the binding of that control. 在下面的代码示例中，控件绑定到`FirstName`的列`Customers`表上`dataSet1`数据集通过窗体上。In the following code example, a control is bound to the `FirstName` column of a `Customers` table on the `dataSet1` dataset through the for the form it is on. ```vb TextBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName") ``` ```csharp textBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` ```cpp textBox1->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` 可以添加第二个控件 (`TextBox2`) 到窗体并将其绑定到`LastName`的列`Customers`同一个数据集中的表。You can add a second control (`TextBox2`) to the form and bind it to the `LastName` column of the `Customers` table in the same dataset. 识别的第一个绑定 (`TextBox1`到`Customers.FirstName`)，因此它会使用相同，如两个文本框绑定到同一数据集 (`DataSet1`)。The is aware of the first binding (`TextBox1` to `Customers.FirstName`), so it would use the same , as both text boxes are bound to the same dataset (`DataSet1`). ```vb TextBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName") ``` ```csharp textBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` ```cpp textBox2->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` 如果您将绑定`TextBox2`其他数据集，创建和管理第二个。If you bind `TextBox2` to a different dataset, the creates and manages a second . 它是重要的是有关如何设置一致并属性; 否则为创建多个货币管理器对于相同数据集，这会导致错误。It is important to be consistent about how you set the and properties; otherwise, the creates multiple currency managers for the same dataset, which results in errors. 下面的代码示例演示了多种用于设置属性和其关联对象。The following code example shows a few ways to set the properties and their associated objects. 只要在整个代码都一致，可以设置属性使用以下方法之一。You can set the properties using either of the following methods, as long as you are consistent throughout your code. ```vb ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1 ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1, "Customers").Position = 1 ``` ```csharp comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1, "Customers"].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1, "Customers")->Position = 1; ``` ```vb ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1.Customers).Position = 1 ``` ```csharp comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1.Customers].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1->Customers; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1->Customers)->Position = 1; ``` > [!NOTE] > 大多数 Windows 窗体应用程序绑定通过。Most Windows Forms applications bind through a . 组件封装，并公开编程接口。The component encapsulates a and exposes the programming interface. 使用时绑定，应使用由公开的成员操纵"货币"(即`Position`) 而不是通过。When using a for binding, you should use the members exposed by the to manipulate "currency" (that is, `Position`) rather than go through the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建四个对象将五个控件绑定 —和四个控件 — 对多个数据源。The following code example creates four objects to bind five controls—a and four controls—to several data sources. 然后用于获取每个数据源。The is then used to get the for each data source. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要有多个实例相同的数据源，创建一个新并将其设置为继承的对象属性类。If you want to have multiple instances for the same data source, create a new and set it to the property of an object that inherits from the class. 例如，如果您有两个对象 (从两个不同对象)，可以设置的每个属性为不同的值。For example, if you have two objects (from two different objects), you can set the properties of each to different values. 这将导致每个集的数据绑定控件以显示相同的数据源中的不同值。This causes each set of data-bound controls to display different values from the same data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建两个新对象，并将分配到每个对象属性的控件。The following code example creates two new objects and assigns each object to the property of a control. `GroupBox1` 包含`TextBox1`，并`GroupBox2`包含`TextBox2`(这通过实现方法类)。`GroupBox1` contains `TextBox1`, and `GroupBox2` contains `TextBox2` (which is accomplished by using the method of the class). 然后该示例添加到两个对象控件绑定到相同的数据源和数据成员的每个。The example then adds objects to the two controls, binding each to the same data source and data member. 该示例还演示使用的两个事件处理程序从设置的控件属性上不同对象。The example also shows two event handlers that use the from the controls to set the property on different objects. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用此重载想不需要导航路径。Use this overload if the you want does not require a navigation path. 例如，如果管理的一组对象使用或作为，没有导航路径是必需的。For example, if the manages a set of objects that use an or as the , no navigation path is required. > [!NOTE] > 属性将始终返回，并且永远不会返回`null`。The property will always return a , and never return `null`. 请参阅类有关可能的数据源的列表和有关创建控件和数据源之间的绑定信息。See the class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources. ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回三个对象： 一个用于，一个用于，，另一个用于的属于控件。The following code example returns three objects: one for a , one for an , and one for the of a that belongs to a control. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载何时管理的一组为其数据源包含多个对象的对象。Use this overload when the manages a set of objects for which the data source contains multiple objects. 例如，可能包含多条对象的链接对象。For example, a can contain several objects linked by objects. 在这种情况下，需要导航路径才能以返回正确。In such a case, the navigation path is required to enable the to return the correct . > [!NOTE] > 属性将始终返回，当`dataMember`参数才有效。The property will always return a , when the `dataMember` parameter is valid. 它将永远不会返回`null`。It will never return `null`. 请参阅类有关可能的数据源的列表和有关创建控件和数据源之间的绑定信息。See the class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources. 如果所需管理一个列表，列表还必须结束的导航路径。If the desired manages a list, the navigation path must also end with a list. 例如，下面的 C# 代码将绑定订单日期的订单表中的控件。For example, the following C# code binds a control to the order date in a table of orders. 导航路径包括，则，和。The navigation path includes the , the , and the . 但是，仅使用，必须检索和（解析为一个列表）。However, the must be retrieved using only the and (which resolves to a list). ``` // The navigation path for a Binding ends with a property. textBox1.DataBindings.Add ("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"); // The navigation path for the BindingManagerBase ends with a list. BindingManagerBase bmOrders = this.BindingContext [dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders"]; ``` 返回时，应使用相同的数据源和修改仅的导航路径。When returning a , you should use the same data source as the and modify only the navigation path. 使用方法以确定所需已存在。Use the method to determine if the desired already exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来检索为特定的绑定。The following code example demonstrates how to use the to retrieve the for a particular binding. 它还演示如何处理事件以确保一个控件值发生更改时，绑定到相同的数据源的多个控件保持同步。It also shows how to handle the event for the to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体并调用`InitializeControlsAndData`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取 所管理的 对象的总数。

span.span: Gets the total number of objects managed by the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回的数管理的对象。The following code example returns the number of objects managed by the .
